refnamediv.refpurpose: This function converts NTSC values to RGB color space.

listitem.para: It is a list of the NTSC luminance (Y) and chrominance (I and Q) color components.
It is a list that contains the red, green, and blue values equivalent to those colors.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Converts NTSC values to RGB color space.
